why_us.WHY_US_TEXT: CodeNovex transforms complex business challenges into elegant software solutions that drive measurable ROI. Built on Fortune 500 standards, our approach delivers enterprise-grade applications that can reduce operational costs by up to 40% and scale seamlessly with your growth. Partnering with CodeNovex means you're not just getting code - you're gaining a strategic technology partner committed to your long-term success.
why_us.PRICING_TEXT: A fixed-price project model eliminates budget uncertainty. You'll receive a detailed proposal with clear milestones, deliverables, and ROI projections before any commitment. Most clients see positive returns within 6-12 months of launch.
why_us.PRICING_BOX: CodeNovex stays ahead of the technology curve so your business stays competitive. Continuous R&D means you benefit from cutting-edge solutions like AI integration and cloud-native architecture - without the enterprise price tag.

team.WHO_WE_ARE_TEXT: CodeNovex was founded on a single principle: technology must solve a business problem, not just complete a task. This philosophy grew from direct experience with enterprise-level, mission-critical systems, where one lesson became clear: project success is determined not by the complexity of the code, but by the clarity of the strategy and the strength of the architecture. That is why the CodeNovex approach focuses not on 'what' to build, but on 'why' it's being built and 'how' to build it right.

services.WHAT_WE_DO_TEXT: Enterprise-Grade Software Solutions That Drive Revenue Growth & Operational Excellence
services.WEB3: Build decentralized applications (dApps) and blockchain solutions that enhance security, reduce transaction costs, and create new revenue streams. Perfect for fintech, supply chain, and digital asset businesses.
services.UI/UX: Increase conversion rates by up to 200% with data-driven interface design. UX research identifies friction points and optimizes user flows to maximize engagement and customer lifetime value.
services.FRONT_END: Lightning-fast, mobile-responsive interfaces that load in under 2 seconds. Built with React, Vue, or Angular to deliver app-like experiences that keep users engaged and reduce bounce rates.
services.BACK_END: Scalable server architecture that handles millions of requests without breaking. A microservices approach ensures 99.9% uptime, seamless third-party integrations, and effortless scaling as your user base grows.
services.SEO: Dominate search rankings and multiply organic traffic. Technical SEO strategies help clients achieve first-page Google rankings for competitive keywords, driving 300%+ increases in qualified leads.

contactForm.HEADING: Let's Build Something Amazing Together
contactForm.SUBHEADING: Tell us about your project and we'll get back to you within 24 hours with a detailed proposal.
contactForm.MESSAGE_PLACEHOLDER: Tell us about your project requirements...
contactForm.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We'll contact you within 24 hours.
contactForm.ERROR_MESSAGE: An error occurred. Please try again or email us directly at info@codenovex.ge
contactForm.PRIVACY_TEXT: We respect your privacy. Your information will never be shared with third parties.

footer.FOOTER_TEXT: Ready to scale your business with custom software? Let's discuss your project and provide a detailed roadmap to success.
